content:
TRANSLATION/翻訳

"File Not Found" Email Won't Delete

File not found. Please check the file location and try again. 

  Check the address for uppercase/lowercase differences or other mistakes.   The file may have been renamed, deleted, or moved.

A copy of the message is here.

The above message is displayed, but I cannot delete it. It is also not saved in the local mailbox. I even recreated the Trash folder, but it didn't work. The sender's address is showing the latest email address and seems to be bugged.

I would like to know how to delete it.


RESPONSE/応答

I cannot help. I have translated to make it easier for other people to help.

お力にはなれません。ほかの人が助けやすいように翻訳しました。
creator: mozilla98

content:
The following link might be helpful: Automatic Conversion of Google mail accounts to OAuth 2.0 Authentication https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/automatic-conversion-google-mail-accounts-oauth20

Please see "How to avoid or correct an OAuth failure caused by disabled javascript" section in the above link.

After editing the value of javascript.enabled, close Thunderbird and reopen Thunderbird for the changes to take effect.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: I regret this happened, but the thunderbird website is not affiliated with any such site. I encourage you to contact them and report this problem and request a refund.
creator: davidsk

content: Hallo, hast du die Bitdefender Toolbar in Thunderbird installiert? Tritt der Fehler auch auf, wenn du Thunderbird im Fehlerbehebungsmodus startest? Zum gleichen Thema gab es kürzlich diese lange Diskussion im deutschen Thunderbird Mail DE forum https://www.thunderbird-mail.de/forum/thread/97088-nach-update-ungelesene-email-nicht-mehr-fett/?pageNo=1
creator: Mapenzi

content:
Hi Cristina.

Do you mean Thunderbird's "primary password", which secures access to account passwords and which probably few people use, or do you actually need to recover the password of an e-mail account?

If you need to recover the password of an e-mail account, you will probably have to re-set your password with your e-mail service provider.
creator: mozilla98

content:
Questo è solo un forum di utenti, non possiamo conoscere le tue impostazioni...

Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content:

u kunt gewoon, na het instellen van de gewenste accounts, uw profiel exporteren en dit op uw andere computer importeren. Hoe dat werkt, leest u hier.

content:
Ora ho provato anche SendTo Menu Editor v1.3, ma questa è la situazione:

Tasto Dx -> Condividi con: c'è solo Outlook! DOVREBBE STARE QUI...; Tasto Dx -> Condividi con -> Altre opzioni: c'è solo Outlook; Tasto Dx -> Mostra altre opzioni -> Invia a -> Thunderbird: apre solo Thunderbird, perché non è specificato che deve allegare il file a una nuova email.
creator: Datmann

content:
That is a message from the server and not Thunderbird.

That IP address is in New Jersey, USA

I checked with Spamhaus and it says: https://check.spamhaus.org/results?query=161.178.137.204

Date Listed: October 29, 2025 04:15:53 Date Removed: November 11, 2025 03:45:31

Why was this IP listed? A device using 161.178.137.204 is infected with malware:

161.178.137.204 initiated a connection to a corebot command and control server, with contents unique to corebot C&C command protocols. Technical details of the corebot detection

161.178.137.204 initiated a tcp connection from 161.178.137.204 using source port 51585, to the sinkhole IP address 216.218.185.162 on destination port 80.

The most recent detection was on: October 27 2025, 23:07:20 UTC.


Do you have a VPN enabled on the computer ? It's worth checking out because some Anti-Virus products now include a VPN and I've discovered there are occasions when user did not realise it was enabled. Switch VPN off.

Servers do not like VPN as it attempts to hide your Ip address, so server thinks you might be hacker and blocks access.

Important - check computer: Restart computer in 'Safe Mode' Run a full scan.
creator: Toad-Hall

content:
1. Go to account settings.
  2. Click on the name of the account.
  3. Type in the text box below "Signature text".

creator: BS6600

content: If you use the global search: in the search results tab click on "Show results as list" in the upper right corner. This will display the found messages as list in a new tab. Add the "Location" column in the list headers so can identify the "missing" folder, then R-click on the message > Open > Open message in containing folder. This way you'll see where the missing folders is located.
creator: Mapenzi
